snippet: In Philadelphia, Mr. Obama appealed to young and minority voters while criticizing Donald J. Trump and coverage that had turned the race into a “reality show.”...

byline.contributor: Amy Chozick contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: In Philadelphia, Mr. Obama appealed to young and minority voters while criticizing Donald J. Trump and coverage that had turned the race into a “reality show.”

headline.main: Obama Condemns Trump in Full-Throated Pitch for Clinton
headline.print_headline: Obama Urges His Backers to Help Clinton and Ignore ‘Nonsense’
